# Positive control
**Description**: CRISPR screens with _Coculture_ condition using a list of positive control genes. Negative LFC values indicate genes whose knockout can increase the efficacy of NK / T cell mediated tumor killing<br />

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width='100%', fig.align='left', fig.cap=''}
knitr::include_graphics("assets/positive_control_final/QC_Heatmap_scaled_coculture.svg", error = FALSE)
```

-----

# 29776993 | JaneOliaro | SciImmunol | 2018 | MC38 | NK.10
## **Overview**
**PMID**: 29776993<br />
**Model**: MC38 (murine colon adenocarcinoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: After CRISPR screen, MC38 cells were cocultured with natural killer (NK) cells at effector : target ratio of 10<br />
**Control**: T-end without NK cell treatment<br />
**Type**: Coculture-NK<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse colon adenocarcinoma cells MC38 co-cultured with NK cells at E:T ratio of 10, compared to T-end without NK cell treatment. Negative LFC values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of NK-cell mediated tumor killing<br />

## **Original Figures**
```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width='85%', fig.align='left', fig.cap=''}
knitr::include_graphics("assets/original_fig/29776993_JaneOliaro_SciImmunol_2018_MC38_NK_Coculture-NK_COAD.overview.png", error = FALSE)
knitr::include_graphics("assets/original_fig/29776993_JaneOliaro_SciImmunol_2018_MC38_NK_Coculture-NK_COAD.png", error = FALSE)
```

-----
